item.description: Trapped Vehicle - Fatality; INC#0299; 06:06AM; Wb 10 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FyBY7t; Jefferson Park; Firefighters located a single car traffic accident with one patient entrapped. An immediate extraction operation ensued and firefighter/paramedics accessed the patient (age/gender unknown at this time) to conduct an assessment. Unfortunately, the patient was beyond medical help and determined dead on scene. CHP and LA County Coroner will handle the investigation regarding identify and cause of death. All questions are referred to CHP Log# 813. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E13 E226 E26 E34 E68 EM11 HR3 RA26 RA29 T26; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0696; 12:21PM; 710 W 82nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/30L4tQk; Vermont Knolls; KNOCKDOWN: 51 firefighters fully extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM22 E209 E233 E264 E266 E3 E57 E64 EM11 EM13 RA257 RA264 RA57 RA64 T33 T64 T66 T9; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0696; 12:05PM; 710 W 82nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/30L4tQk; Vermont Knolls; A two story, garden style apartment building with an active attic fire and initial reports of one unit well involved. There are no reported injuries at this time. One additional task force requested.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E266 E57 E64 EM11 EM13 RA257 RA264 RA57 RA64 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire - Assisting Agency; INC#0672; 11:50AM; Nb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DEu7EL; Sylmar; LAFD resources are on scene as an Assisting Agency to LA County Fire with an approximately 2 acre slow moving brush fire. This incident is entirely within LA County Fire jurisdiction and all further updates are via LACoFD. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E18 E287 E298 E7 E70 E75 E87 E90 E91 EM15 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA91 T87 T98; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#0584; 11:06AM; 2699 N Westridge Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HHOrHZ; Brentwood; One 45yo male mountain biker sustained a fall and has serious injuries. Due to location and patient condition, LAFD Air Ops is preparing for a hoist rescue and air ambulance transport. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 10:50AM. No further details. ; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 BP19 E109 E19 E269 H2 H4 HA2 HA4 RA19 RH214 T69; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0207; 04:18AM; 520 E 9th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HEdono; Downtown; Firefighters found a two-story commercial structure with smoke showing and sprinkler activation. While sprinklers were holding much of the fire in check, flames had made their way up to the mezzanine, where textiles were stored. It took 92 firefighters 61 minutes (5:19 AM) to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E14 E17 E201 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA10 RA209 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T15 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0525; 10:40AM; 1544 N Lachman Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CyJzB4; Pacific Palisades; Firefighters have located a lost elderly male in the hills of Pacific Palisades. He was reportedly lost/missing for days prior. LAFD Air Operations hoisted him from his remote location and transported him to an area hospital for further care.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 BC9 E23 E269 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA23 RH114 T69; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0444; 09:57AM; 2500 E Whittier Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FweD6f; Boyle Heights; *Corrected Address* Firefighters found an approximately 40' x 60' standalone one-story commercial building (and site of a previous burn), with no other structures threatened. Firefighters began the attack from the exterior, in defensive mode, and as the flames were quickly knocked back, transitioned to offensive mode to finish off extinguishment. Ultimately, it took 34 firefighters 18 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 CM22 E10 E17 E203 E209 E210 E25 E9 RA209 RA25 T10 T3 T9; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0444; 09:39AM; 2424 E Whittier Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qSePc1; Boyle Heights; Two-story commercial building with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E203 E209 E25 E9 RA209 RA25 T3 T9; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN (updated address) Structure Fire; INC#1443; 07:56PM; 15106 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/30hmOnL; Sylmar; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. After an initial transitional attack from the exterior, firefighters were able to make entry and move into an offensive attack. A thorough search of the structure found no occupants inside. The address was updated and the structure was identified as one of three on the property. None of the other buildings were damaged. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E75 E91 RA891 RA91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
